ygData.subject: RE: [warriors_eq] Re: Where to be lvl 31
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings! I play on Innoruuk too.  Sol-a is a difficult zone.  Folks try it one time and probably don t have a lot of success so they take a course of less
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings!

I play on Innoruuk too. Sol-a is a difficult zone. Folks try it one time
and probably don't have a lot of success so they take a course of less
resistence. First time I went there, I fell into the lava and died - ran
off the ramp trying to run to the zone because we were swamped by gobs.
Spent the next hour+ doing CR.

Also, the average level on Inny is prolly higher than 30 - so the places for
30's are less populated than mid 40 to mid 50.

Old world places for 30:

Highkeep Pickclaws (although you will be among the older folks there)
Cazic Thule (with a good group - this place is great)
Unrest (a good group in the basement torture chamber or ghost room)
Runnyeye (not well frequented but a good group there can get exp)

Kunark:
Lake of Ill Omen (I think you will be among the older folks here)
Frontier Mountains

Scars of Vellious:
Iceclad Ocen (Cougar camps - might be a touch low fo rhere but in a group
should do fine)

Sylly Songsynger
(The Pantheon)
Troubador, somewhere on Innoruuk...

P.s. oh yeah, my warrior is level 15, parked in Firona Vie, holding some
extra stuff for me - dont think he will ever see much fighting but he was my
first regular char.


-----Original Message-----
From: John Pool [mailto:jpool10550@...]
Sent: Thursday, January 18, 2001 7:39 AM
To: warriors_eq@egroups.com
Subject: [warriors_eq] Re: Where to be lvl 31


Went back to up to SolA after patch and still same deal. There were 2
45s and 38lvl and me in zone, i waited a while but no one showed up.
Either the extra exp knowledge is not out or some reason Innoruuk
server just nevers has anyone in this zone.>
